content: this check your stripes set is a timeless capsule collection for special new arrivals find patterns for a jumper with classic stripe to add a touch of timeless charm a cosy essential beanie and an adorable gingham teddy bear ready to be snuggled - this set is sure to delight both parents and little ones alike pair these designs with the beloved baby cashmerino to ensure ultimate comfort against baby s delicate skin **size** to fit age 3-6 6-9 9-12 12-18 18-24 months **finished measurements** sweater chest 56 60 64 68 72 cm 22 23½ 25 26¾ 28¼ in length to shoulder 28 30 33 36 39 cm 11 12 13 14¼ 15¼ in sleeve length 15 17 19 21 23 cm 6 6¾ 7½ 8¼ 9 in hat to fit age 3-9 9-12 12-18 18-24 months teddy bear approximately 20cm/8in high **materials** sweater 50g/1¾oz balls of debbie bliss baby cashmerino 2 2 3 3 4 balls in white 100 a 2 2 3 3 4 balls in kingfisher 72 c pair of 3mm us 2 knitting needles pair of 3 25mm us 3 long double pointed needles or one medium length circular needle 2 buttons teddy bear 50g/1¾oz balls of debbie bliss baby cashmerino 1 ball in white 100 a 1 ball in duck egg 26 b 1 ball in kingfisher 72 c pair of 3 25mm us 3 knitting needles washable toy stuffing hat 50g/1¾oz balls of debbie bliss baby cashmerino 2 balls in kingfisher 72 c pair of 3 25mm us 3 knitting needles full set 50g/1¾oz balls of debbie bliss baby cashmerino 3 3 4 4 5 balls in white 100 a 1 ball in duck egg 26 b 5 5 6 6 7 balls in kingfisher 72 c **alternative colourways** white 100 a rose pink 94 b russet 315 c **gauge** 25 sts and 34 row to 10cm/4in square over st st using 3 25mm us 3 needles 39 sts and 34 row to 10cm/4in square over 2x2 rib using 3 25mm us 3 needles
